definition: yarn arranged lengthways on a loom and crossed by the woof, bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat
details:
noun
- yarn arranged lengthways on a loom and crossed by the woof
- a moral or mental distortion
= synonyms: warping
- a shape distorted by twisting or folding
= synonyms: buckle
- a twist or aberration
= synonyms: deflection
verb
- bend out of shape, as under pressure or from heat
= synonyms: heave
- make false by mutilation or addition
= synonyms: falsify, distort, garble
